page.title: 08KIRKCOWAN GUIDES
page.content: The company meet on a Monday night.They meet at the Recreation Hall in Kirkcowan.Kirkcowan Guides started on the 23rd of April 1924 and last year celebrated their{Diamond Jubilee. They planted a Norway Maple tree to commemorate this,in the Rest Garden. Mrs Marsh is the Guide Guider and Mrs Briggs and Mrs Marshall.There are about 16 Guides in{3 patrols.}Some Guides are doing their Baden Powell- Trefoil which is the highest award in Guides but you have to be 13 years old to begin working for it.There are lots of other{badges}like craft and service badges.Once a year the girls go to Stronord which is an{outdoor centre} about 12mls away from Kirkcowan.They go to Newton Stewart for country dancing competitions.They won in 1985. There was a big{camp}in 1985 which had Guides from lots of Districts.
